title: what the nerfs to yasuo should be
body:
disclaimer: havent actually looked at them but i suspect they arent what ill say

1. fuck his q (post 2 hits) make that shit so they can e-q 3 times then ult (remove the e-q part) or make it so they need 3 stacks first 
2. fuck windwall that shit can block more shit than braum SHEILD,  idk where riot got this idea from but last time i check shields can block the same shit a wall can (to some degree)
3. his damn e is what makes it impossible to run away with even after slowing him, give this shit a longer cooldown 
4. his fuckign ult is retarded, ive see yasuos in bronze hit 5 man ults because they get naut supp/top and then chain naut ult with yas q to ult-  make this shit only be able to hit 3 or have it so other champions cant proc it 

better yet remove yasuo, i dont want him in this game, hes annoying to lane against (i just ban this fucker if im not bot or jungle) and he was to much range in teamfights by e-ing ever second and hitting 5 man ults, like gg we cant win if that shit happens multiple teamfights

replies.body: Lul, fucking shitters complaining about a champion who isnt even broken.
oh i dont think hes op, ive seen yasuos suck ass and lose lane (ie apparently me), i just hate lannign against him cause he moves a fuck ton and i cant lane against him
This post is really something, and I'll be keeping it in mind in the near future.
I was a vague way of saying "this is bad and I'm going to share it with my buddy and laugh," but ok.
